Package io.permazen.cli.parse

Interface Parser<T>

Type Parameters:
T - parsed value type
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractKVCommand.BytesParser, EncodingParser, EnumNameParser, ObjIdParser, WhateverParser, WordParser
Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface public interface Parser<T>
Generic parsing interface.

  • Method Details

    • parse

      T parse(Session session, String text)
      Parse value from the given text.
      Parameters:
      session - CLI session
      text - input to parse
      Returns:
      parsed value
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if parse fails
      IllegalArgumentException - if either parameter is null
